title: WTT Nap Portrait and Mathewson DC
author: jonvancouver

posts.post_title: WTT Nap Portrait and Mathewson DC
posts.post_content:
Hi all, 
I'm looking to trade my Nap Portrait (SOLD) and Mathewson Dark Cap for SGC 60 T206's.
Commons/random HOF (Waddell portrait anyone?!?!) will do and centering/registration is extremely important to me.
While these are 2 pretty good cards, they just aren't fitting into my set.

I'm sorry that I don't have a specific list but I'm only at around 100 T206s so I need way too many to list.

You can either PM me or email me at [url]jschwartz@entonegroup.com[/url]

[URL="[URL=http://s1249.photobucket.com/user/JonIraSchwartz/media/MathewsonDCFront.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1249.photobucket.com/albums/hh517/JonIraSchwartz/MathewsonDCFront.jpg[/IMG][/URL]"][URL=http://s1249.photobucket.com/user/JonIraSchwartz/media/MathewsonDCFront.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1249.photobucket.com/albums/hh517/JonIraSchwartz/MathewsonDCFront.jpg[/IMG][/URL][/URL]

[URL="[URL=http://s1249.photobucket.com/user/JonIraSchwartz/media/MathewsonDCBack.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1249.photobucket.com/albums/hh517/JonIraSchwartz/MathewsonDCBack.jpg[/IMG][/URL]"][URL=http://s1249.photobucket.com/user/JonIraSchwartz/media/MathewsonDCBack.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1249.photobucket.com/albums/hh517/JonIraSchwartz/MathewsonDCBack.jpg[/IMG][/URL][/URL]

[URL=http://s1249.photobucket.com/user/JonIraSchwartz/media/NLajoiePortFront.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1249.photobucket.com/albums/hh517/JonIraSchwartz/NLajoiePortFront.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

[URL="[URL=http://s1249.photobucket.com/user/JonIraSchwartz/media/NLajoiePortBack.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1249.photobucket.com/albums/hh517/JonIraSchwartz/NLajoiePortBack.jpg[/IMG][/URL]"][URL=http://s1249.photobucket.com/user/JonIraSchwartz/media/NLajoiePortBack.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1249.photobucket.com/albums/hh517/JonIraSchwartz/NLajoiePortBack.jpg[/IMG][/URL][/URL]

Still available!
Just for clarity, I'm looking for 235 in trade for the Nap and 750 in trade for the Matty.
Looking for centered SGC 60 or PSA 5 T206 or T205s in trade. (not minor leaguers)

Thank you!

Any interest in an SGC 45 Lajoie throwing for the Lajoie portrait? I'm working on a portrait only set.

I'll look and see if I have any others in SGC 60 or PSA 5.

This photo is from when it was in a GAI 4 holder... it's SGC 45 now.

[IMG]http://s8.postimg.org/8txjy67z9/lajoiethrow.jpg[/IMG]
